dict.acceptation: 权威；权力；学术权威；[复数]当权者；

sent.orig: The authority of a college mainly consists of administrative authority and academic authority.
sent.trans: 大学内部的权力主要由行政权力和学术权力构成。

sent.orig: The system of invoking authority stipulates that the country civil servant authority fairly.
sent.trans: 权力运行制度规范国家公职人员公正地行使权力。

sent.orig: Both express authority and implied authority can create agency.
sent.trans: 明示授权和默示授权都能产生代理。

sent.orig: The political authority of the landlords is the backbone of all the other systems of authority.
sent.trans: 地主政权，是一切权力的基干。

sent.orig: The system of distributing authority stipulates that the state-owned unit distributes authority scientifically, reasonably and clearly.
sent.trans: 权力配置制度规范国有单位科学、合理、明确地配置权力。
